import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import './header.style.scss' const Header = ({currentUser}) =>{ //const {currentUser} = props return(
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser?
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
: SIGNIN }
{ this.props.hidden? () :
}
) } const mapStateToProps = ({user , cart}) =>({ currentUser: user.currentUser, hidden: cart.hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
